contentList.content: Gains a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
The target gains a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
Throw a bubble of acid that damages each creature it hits and covers them in <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ACID">Acid</LSTag>.
